episode_event_general_easter_2021/6701_1:
Hey there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. I’ve been
waiting for you.

First, let me introduce you to my partner Pokémon!
This is Togepi.

Togepi’s shell is said to be filled with happiness.
I’m sure he’d be happy to share some with you!

We became good friends while I was conducting
fieldwork with my dad in another region!

And look at these outfits! May and I both got them
to match our partners!

They’re the perfect outfits for the egg hunt we’re
hosting today!

The egg hunt is an event where participants will
go searching for decorated eggs we’ve hidden all
over Pasio!

Burgh decorated the eggs himself, so they’re
all unique!

We’ve been working hard and hope that everyone
can enjoy the event!
episode_event_general_easter_2021/6801_1:
I want everyone to enjoy
our egg hunt...

You’ll have to excuse me, but Sawyer has asked
me to meet him at the arena.

He seemed a little worked up about something...
I wonder what happened.

I bet he’s just surprised by all the people who’ve
shown up to join the hunt!

Once you’re ready, let’s head over there together!
The egg hunt’s gonna be a blast!
